name: Crushed (itch) (Hummingbird Games)
description:
STORY

Corey’s winter break gets a lot more interesting when the love of his life, ahem, his newest crush moves to Thomastown. Can he convince the new kid to give him a chance or will he fumble at love once again?

FEATURES

  • ~20K words (full version)
  • 3 endings
  • 2 precious Black boys 
  • text messages!!
  • lots of talk about...books??

CONTENT WARNINGS

biphobia (challenged) reference to transphobic parent, anxiety (behavior + discussion) and strong language.

CREDITS

story + programing - gemini💛

character sprites - secxen

GUI - NovelKit

phone code + assets - nitgen

music - louie zong,  astronaut troy

voice acting - Tarra "Miche" Ward

FULL GAME: SUMMER 2023
